labels.analysis: The Quran MCP Server is designed to provide comprehensive access to the Holy Quran, offering tools for retrieving verses, chapters, translations, and audio recitations. It allows users to search specific sections (Juz, Sajda verses, etc.) and compare multiple translations side-by-side. The server supports multi-language access and provides rich content in various formats (full, minified, different scripts). The primary functionality revolves around Quranic studies, research, and knowledge integration.
labels.reasoning: The primary label "Religious & Spiritual" is chosen because the server's core focus is on the Quran, which is centrally tied to religious practices and studies. Secondary labels like "Web Search & Research" and "Memory Management" are included because the server enables deep research and structured storage/retrieval of Quranic information.

tools.name: get_quran_editions
tools.description:
Mevcut tüm Kuran sürümlerini güzelleştirilmiş JSON biçiminde listeler.
    Lists all available Quran editions in pretty JSON format.

tools.name: get_quran_editions_min
tools.description:
Mevcut tüm Kuran sürümlerinin küçültülmüş versiyonunu getirir.
    Lists all available Quran editions in minified JSON format.

tools.name: get_quran_full
tools.description:
Tüm Kuran'ı/Kuran tercümesini getirir.
    Gets the full Quran or translation.

    Args / Parametreler:
        edition_name: Sürüm adı (örn: "ben-muhiuddinkhan") / Edition name (e.g. "ben-muhiuddinkhan")
        script_type: Yazı tipi ("" = normal, "la" = latin, "lad" = latin diakritikli) / Script type ("" = normal, "la" = latin, "lad" = latin with diacritics)

tools.name: get_quran_chapter
tools.description:
Belirtilen bölümün tamamını getirir.
    Gets the full chapter (surah).

    Args / Parametreler:
        edition_name: Sürüm adı / Edition name
        chapter_no: Bölüm numarası (1-114) / Chapter number (1-114)
        script_type: Yazı tipi ("" = normal, "la" = latin, "lad" = latin diakritikli) / Script type ("" = normal, "la" = latin, "lad" = latin with diacritics)
        minified: Küçültülmüş format isteniyor mu / Whether minified format is requested

tools.name: get_quran_verse
tools.description:
Belirtilen ayeti getirir.
    Gets the specified verse.

    Args / Parametreler:
        edition_name: Sürüm adı / Edition name
        chapter_no: Bölüm numarası (1-114) / Chapter number (1-114)
        verse_no: Ayet numarası / Verse number
        script_type: Yazı tipi ("" = normal, "la" = latin, "lad" = latin diakritikli) / Script type ("" = normal, "la" = latin, "lad" = latin with diacritics)

tools.name: get_quran_juz
tools.description:
Belirtilen cüzü getirir.
    Gets the specified juz.

    Args / Parametreler:
        edition_name: Sürüm adı / Edition name
        juz_no: Cüz numarası (1-30) / Juz number (1-30)
        script_type: Yazı tipi ("" = normal, "la" = latin, "lad" = latin diakritikli) / Script type ("" = normal, "la" = latin, "lad" = latin with diacritics)

tools.name: get_quran_ruku
tools.description:
Belirtilen rükuyu getirir.
    Gets the specified ruku.

    Args / Parametreler:
        edition_name: Sürüm adı / Edition name
        ruku_no: Rüku numarası / Ruku number
        script_type: Yazı tipi ("" = normal, "la" = latin, "lad" = latin diakritikli) / Script type ("" = normal, "la" = latin, "lad" = latin with diacritics)

tools.name: get_quran_page
tools.description:
Belirtilen sayfayı getirir.
    Gets the specified page.

    Args / Parametreler:
        edition_name: Sürüm adı / Edition name
        page_no: Sayfa numarası / Page number
        script_type: Yazı tipi ("" = normal, "la" = latin, "lad" = latin diakritikli) / Script type ("" = normal, "la" = latin, "lad" = latin with diacritics)

tools.name: get_quran_manzil
tools.description:
Belirtilen menzili getirir.
    Gets the specified manzil.

    Args / Parametreler:
        edition_name: Sürüm adı / Edition name
        manzil_no: Menzil numarası (1-7) / Manzil number (1-7)
        script_type: Yazı tipi ("" = normal, "la" = latin, "lad" = latin diakritikli) / Script type ("" = normal, "la" = latin, "lad" = latin with diacritics)

tools.name: get_quran_maqra
tools.description:
Belirtilen makrayı getirir.
    Gets the specified maqra.

    Args / Parametreler:
        edition_name: Sürüm adı / Edition name
        maqra_no: Makra numarası / Maqra number
        script_type: Yazı tipi ("" = normal, "la" = latin, "lad" = latin diakritikli) / Script type ("" = normal, "la" = latin, "lad" = latin with diacritics)

tools.name: get_quran_info
tools.description:
Kuran'daki cüz sayısı, secdeler, rükular vb. gibi Kuran hakkında tüm ayrıntıları getirir.
    Gets all details about the Quran such as number of juz, sajdas, rukus, etc.

tools.name: get_quran_fonts
tools.description:
Mevcut Arapça yazı tiplerini listeler.
    Lists available Arabic fonts.

server_info_crawled.name: Quran MCP Server
server_info_crawled.author: @HarunGuclu/mcp_quran
server_info_crawled.overview: Provide AI assistants with seamless access to the Holy Quran, enabling retrieval of verses, chapters, translations, and audio recitations. Search the Quranic text, access specific sections like Juz and Sajda verses, and compare multiple translations side-by-side. Enhance Quranic knowledge integration with multi-language support and rich content access.

server_info_crawled.python_sdk:
import mcp
from mcp.client.streamable_http import streamablehttp_client
import json
import base64

smithery_api_key = ""
url = f"https://server.smithery.ai/@HarunGuclu/mcp_quran/mcp?api_key={smithery_api_key}"

async def main():
    # Connect to the server using HTTP client
    async with streamablehttp_client(url) as (read_stream, write_stream, _):
        async with mcp.ClientSession(read_stream, write_stream) as session:
            # Initialize the connection
            await session.initialize()
            # List available tools
            tools_result = await session.list_tools()
            print(f"Available tools: {', '.join([t.name for t in tools_result.tools])}")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    import asyncio
    asyncio.run(main())
